mapper.select:
select id, question_content as questionContent, question_type as questionType,
from question_t where id=#{id} and use_yn!='n'
mapper.insert:
insert into question_t(question_content,question_type, question_type_id, ) values( #{questionContent}, #{questionType}, #{questionTypeId, javaType=INTEGER, jdbcType=INTEGER},
)
mapper.delete: update question_t set use_yn = 'n' where id=#{id}
